welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calcinaia, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of this enchanting place. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Calcinaia has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lucca Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free, but may experience slower speeds during peak travel times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
